channel.title: admin on Gary Weissman, MD, MSHP
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Gary Weissman, MD, MSHP

item.title: Hierarchical condition categories for pulmonary diseases
item.description: Pulmonary diseases and various forms of critical illness play a significant role in this risk adjustment process both through their associated HCC codes and through interactions with other risk categories representing cardiac and psychiatric diseases.

I am a pulmonary and critical care physician at the University of Pennsylvania Perelman School of Medicine, and core faculty at the Palliative and Advanced Illness Research (PAIR) Center. My research interests include clinical informatics, natural language processing, machine learning, population health, and pragmatic trials. I am also a Senior Fellow at the Leonard Davis Institute of Health Economics.
